snippet: A controversial woman at the center of an abuse scandal at a children's home in western Mexico has been set free after a preliminary probe cleared her of wrongdoing, a spokesman for the attorney general's office said on Sunday....

headline.print_headline: Woman in Mexico Children's Home Probe Freed Without Charges
headline.main: Woman in Mexico Children's Home Probe Freed Without Charges

lead_paragraph: A controversial woman at the center of an abuse scandal at a children's home in western Mexico has been set free after a preliminary probe cleared her of wrongdoing, a spokesman for the attorney general's office said on Sunday.
